item.title: The New York Times Wants An America Without Americans
item.description: America cannot survive without heritage Americans.

item.title: Leftists Downplay Dem’s Nazi Tattoo After Calling Hegseth’s Christian Ink ‘White Nationalist’
item.description: The media went hysterical over Pete Hegseth's Jerusalem Cross tattoo but are much less concerned about Graham Platner's Nazi symbol.

item.title: Democrats, Media Clutch Pearls Over President Trump’s Perfectly Above-Board Ballroom Build
item.description: The same people and publications who cheered tearing down statues are now waxing poetic about Trump building a ballroom on private dime.

item.title: Taxpayer-Funded Schools Can’t Prohibit Prayer And Promote Witchcraft
item.description: What looks like harmless exploration of 'different beliefs' is reprogramming the moral compass of the next generation.
